name: Russian for AnySoftKeyboard
description: This is a Cyrillic expansion pack for AnySoftKeyboard. Install AnySoftKeyboard first, and then select the desired layout from AnySoftKeyboards Settings->Keyboards menu.  This pack contains Cyrillic and phonetic Russian keyboard layouts, physical keyboard mapping and dictionary.  Search for AnySoftKeyboard on Google Play.  . .  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.menny.android.anysoftkeyboard
